tenant.guarantor_salary: I add a salary slip from my guarantor issued within the last 3 months, an employer's attestation, proof of payment of internship allowances, a financial statement, or a tax assessment in their name, complete and issued within the last 2 years.
tenant.guest:
Thank you for adding 3 documents:
  • A solemn declaration of free accommodation (we recommend using the attestation template available on the service-public.fr website)
  • A copy of your host's identity document
  • A proof of address of your host issued within the last 3 months: property tax notice, telephone bill, rent receipt, etc.
tenant.guest-parents:
Thank you for adding 3 documents:
  • A solemn declaration of free accommodation (we recommend using the attestation template available on the service-public.fr website)
  • A copy of the parent's identity document
  • A proof of address of your parent issued within the last 3 months: property tax notice, telephone bill, rent receipt, etc.
tenant.identity-card: Please add your ID card front and back.
tenant.passport: Please add pages 2 and 3 of your passport, as the signature must be visible.
tenant.permit: Please add your permit front and back.
tenant.less-than-year: I have declared that I have been in France for less than a year.
tenant.my-name: I add a tax assessment in my name.
tenant.my-parents: I have declared that I am financially dependent on my parents' household.
tenant.organism-guarantor: I add a certificate or a visa issued by the organization guaranteeing for me.
tenant.other-tax: To improve my application, I explain below why I do not receive a tax assessment. My explanation will be added to my application:
tenant.owner: I add a property tax notice issued within the last year.
tenant.pension: I add a pension slip, a pension attestation, or a tax assessment showing the names and income from the pension.
tenant.rent: I add proof of rent payment or a tax assessment showing the names and income from the rent.
tenant.social-service: I add my last three payment proofs for social benefits (unemployment benefits, family allowances...), proof of eligibility, or a screenshot of housing assistance simulation (APL).
tenant.tenant: I add my rent receipts from the last three months.

professional.alternation: Thank you for adding your current or upcoming apprenticeship or professionalization contract here. It must be complete and signed by all parties involved (you, your supervisor, the employer, etc.)
professional.cdd:
Thank you for adding your employment contract here. It must be current or upcoming (completed fixed-term contracts are not accepted), complete (all pages), and signed by you and your employer.

Tips: Do not unnecessarily overload your file with additional documents; the complete contract is sufficient.

If you do not have your employment contract, you can add a employer's attestation issued within the last 3 months.
professional.cdi:
Thank you for adding your current or upcoming employment contract here. It must be complete (all pages) and signed by you and your employer.

Tips: Do not unnecessarily overload your file with additional documents; the complete contract is sufficient.

If you do not have your employment contract, you can add a employer's attestation issued within the last 3 months.
professional.cdi-trial:
Thank you for adding your current or upcoming employment contract here. It must be complete (all pages) and signed by you and your employer.

Tips: Do not unnecessarily overload your file with additional documents; the complete contract is sufficient.

If you do not have your employment contract, you can add a employer's attestation issued within the last 3 months.
professional.ctt:
Thank you for adding your current or upcoming employment contract here. It must be complete (all pages) and signed by you and your employer.

If you do not have your employment contract, you can add an employer's attestation specifying the job position, proposed salary, expected start date, and duration of the contract.

Tips: You can also add your employment certificates from the last 3 months or more if you have them. This will help a landlord ensure the regularity and recurrence of your assignments.
professional.other:
If your current activity does not correspond to any of the choices on this list, you can add a sworn statement explaining your situation here.

Tips: You can use this model sworn statement.
professional.independent:
Thank you for adding one of the following documents here:

  • your professional card (liberal profession)
  • a K extract or K bis extract⁽¹⁾ issued within the last 3 months
  • a SIRENE directory situation certificate⁽²⁾ issued within the last 3 months
  • your account statement⁽³⁾ (for self-employed individuals)
  • a registration certificate⁽⁴⁾ in the National Business Register
  • a income certificate for the current year issued by an accountant

⁽¹⁾ Learn how to obtain a K extract or K bis extract
⁽²⁾ Learn how to obtain a SIRENE directory situation certificate
⁽³⁾ Learn how to download your account statement
⁽⁴⁾ Learn how to obtain a registration certificate

Note: These procedures are completely free of charge.
professional.internship:
Thank you for adding your current or upcoming internship agreement here. It must be complete (all pages) and signed by all parties involved (you, your supervisor, the employer, etc.)

Tips: Do not unnecessarily overload your file with additional documents; the complete agreement is sufficient.
professional.public:
Thank you for adding your current or upcoming appointment order here.

If you do not have your appointment order, you can add an employer's attestation issued within the last 3 months.
professional.retired:
Thank you for adding one of the following documents here:

  • a pension statement or a pension payment attestation issued within the last 2 years
  • a pension entitlement attestation
  • your retirement pension certificate
  • your most recent or penultimate complete income tax notice (all pages)

    • Tips: The pension statement is the most suitable document here. Only add your income tax notice if you have no other document from the list.
professional.scholarship:
Thank you for adding one of the following documents here:

  • your student card
  • a certificate of enrollment

The document must include your name, the name of the institution, and the current academic year.
professional.unemployed:
Thank you for adding one of the following documents:

  • An unemployment situation notice (Pôle emploi⁽¹⁾) issued within the last 3 months
  • A certificate of eligibility for unemployment benefits (ARE)

⁽¹⁾ Learn how to obtain your unemployment situation notice on the Pôle emploi website.
professional.student:
Thank you for adding one of the following documents:

  • Your student card
  • A certificate of enrollment
  • The ParcoursSup registration certificate

The document must include your name, the name of the institution, and the current academic year.

cotenant.alternation: I add their current and signed apprenticeship contract.
cotenant.cdd:
I add their current and signed employment contract.
And if they don't have an employment contract? You can attach a signed and dated attestation from their employer issued within the last 3 months.
cotenant.cdi:
I add their current and signed employment contract.
And if they don't have an employment contract? You can attach a signed and dated attestation from their employer issued within the last 3 months.
cotenant.cdi-trial:
I add their current and signed employment contract.
And if they don't have an employment contract? You can attach a signed and dated attestation from their employer issued within the last 3 months.
cotenant.ctt:
I add their current and signed employment contract.
And if they don't have an employment contract? You can attach a signed and dated attestation from their employer issued within the last 3 months.
cotenant.guarantor_salary: I add a salary slip from their guarantor issued within the last 3 months, an employer's attestation, proof of payment of their internship allowances, a financial statement, or a tax assessment in their name, complete and issued within the last 2 years.
cotenant.guest:
Thank you for adding 3 documents:
  • A solemn declaration of free accommodation (we recommend using the attestation template available on the service-public.fr website)
  • A copy of the host's identity document
  • A proof of address of the host issued within the last 3 months: property tax notice, telephone bill, rent receipt, etc.
cotenant.guest-parents:
Thank you for adding 3 documents:
  • A solemn declaration of free accommodation (we recommend using the attestation template available on the service-public.fr website)
  • A copy of the parent's identity document
  • A proof of address of your parent issued within the last 3 months: property tax notice, telephone bill, rent receipt, etc.
cotenant.identity-card: Please make sure to add their ID card front and back.
cotenant.passport: Please make sure to add pages 2 and 3 of their passport, as the signature must be visible.
cotenant.permit: Please make sure to add their permit front and back.
cotenant.independent: I add their proof of independent professional activity according to their type of activity.
cotenant.internship: I add the complete and signed internship agreement from their guarantor.
cotenant.less-than-year: I have declared that they have been in France for less than a year.
cotenant.my-name: I add a tax assessment in their name.
cotenant.my-parents: They have declared that they are financially dependent on my parents' household.
cotenant.organism-guarantor: I add a certificate or a visa issued by the organization guaranteeing for my partner.
cotenant.other-tax: To improve their application, I explain below why they do not receive a tax assessment. Their explanation will be added to their application:
cotenant.owner: I add a property tax notice issued within the last year.
cotenant.pension: I add a pension slip, a pension attestation, or a tax assessment showing the names and income from the pension.
cotenant.rent: I add proof of rent payment or a tax assessment showing the names and income from the rent.
cotenant.retired: I add a retirement pension slip. And if they don't have one? You can attach their latest complete tax assessment issued within the last 2 years.
cotenant.salary: I add their last three salary slips, or proof of their internship allowances, or their last two financial statements (self-employed).
cotenant.scholarship: I add a scholarship award letter.
cotenant.social-service: I add proof of payment of social benefits (unemployment benefits, CAF, Crous, etc.) from their guarantor issued within the last 3 months, proof of entitlement, or a simulation certificate for housing assistance.
cotenant.student: I add a copy of their student ID card or a certificate of enrollment for the current academic year.
cotenant.tenant: I add their rent receipts for the last three months.
cotenant.unemployed: I add a proof of entitlement to unemployment benefits (ARE) or a Pôle Emploi situation statement issued within the last 3 months.

guarantor.alternation: I add a salary slip from my guarantor issued within the last 3 months, or their complete and signed apprenticeship contract.
guarantor.cdd: I add a salary slip from my guarantor issued within the last 3 months, their complete and signed employment contract, and an employer's attestation issued within the last 3 months.
guarantor.cdi: I add a salary slip from my guarantor issued within the last 3 months, their complete and signed employment contract, and an employer's attestation issued within the last 3 months.
guarantor.cdi-trial: I add a salary slip from my guarantor issued within the last 3 months, their complete and signed employment contract, and an employer's attestation issued within the last 3 months.
guarantor.ctt: I add a salary slip from my guarantor issued within the last 3 months, their complete and signed employment contract, and an employer's attestation issued within the last 3 months.
guarantor.guarantor_salary: I add a salary slip from my guarantor issued within the last 3 months, an employer's attestation, proof of payment of their internship allowances, a financial statement, or a tax assessment in their name, complete and issued within the last 2 years.
guarantor.guest:
Thank you for adding 3 documents:
  • A solemn declaration of free accommodation (we recommend using the attestation template available on the service-public.fr website)
  • A copy of the host's identity document
  • A proof of address of the host issued within the last 3 months: property tax notice, telephone bill, rent receipt, etc.
guarantor.identity-card: Please make sure to add their ID card front and back.
guarantor.passport: Please make sure to add pages 2 and 3 of their passport, as the signature must be visible.

guarantor.internship: I add the complete and signed internship agreement from my guarantor.
guarantor.less-than-year: I have provided all the required documents for my guarantor.
guarantor.my-name: I add a tax assessment issued within the last two years in the name of my guarantor. The fiscal number and the income must be legible.

guarantor.owner: I add a proof of address of my guarantor issued within the last three months.
guarantor.pension: I add a pension slip or attestation from my guarantor, or a tax assessment in their name, complete and issued within the last 2 years.
guarantor.public: I add a salary slip from my guarantor issued within the last 3 months, an employer's attestation issued within the last 3 months, and their appointment decree.
guarantor.rent: I add proof of rent payment from my guarantor, or a tax assessment in their name, complete and issued within the last 2 years.
guarantor.retired: I add a pension slip, attestation, or retirement pension document from my guarantor, or their complete tax assessment issued within the last 2 years.
guarantor.salary: I add a salary slip from my guarantor issued within the last 3 months, an employer's attestation, proof of payment of their internship allowances, a financial statement, or a tax assessment in their name, complete and issued within the last 2 years.
guarantor.scholarship: I add a scholarship award letter from my guarantor.
guarantor.social-service: I add proof of payment of social benefits (unemployment benefits, CAF, Crous, etc.) from my guarantor issued within the last 3 months, proof of entitlement, or a simulation certificate for housing assistance.
guarantor.student: I add a copy of my guarantor's student ID card or a certificate of enrollment for the current academic year.
guarantor.tenant: I add a proof of address of my guarantor issued within the last three months.
guarantor.unemployed: I add proof of entitlement to unemployment benefits (ARE) from my guarantor or their Pôle Emploi situation statement issued within the last 3 months.

cotenant-guarantor.alternation: I add a salary slip from their guarantor issued within the last 3 months, or their complete and signed apprenticeship contract.

cotenant-guarantor.cdi: I add a salary slip from their guarantor issued within the last 3 months, their complete and signed employment contract, and an employer's attestation issued within the last 3 months.
cotenant-guarantor.cdi-trial: I add a salary slip from their guarantor issued within the last 3 months, their complete and signed employment contract, and an employer's attestation issued within the last 3 months.
cotenant-guarantor.ctt: I add a salary slip from their guarantor issued within the last 3 months, their complete and signed employment contract, and an employer's attestation issued within the last 3 months.
cotenant-guarantor.guarantor_salary: I add a salary slip from their guarantor issued within the last 3 months, an employer's attestation, proof of payment of their internship allowances, a financial statement, or a tax assessment in their name, complete and issued within the last 2 years.
cotenant-guarantor.guest: I add a solemn declaration of free accommodation from their guarantor (we recommend using the attestation template available on the service-public.fr website)
cotenant-guarantor.identity-card: Please make sure to add their ID card front and back.
cotenant-guarantor.passport: Please make sure to add pages 2 and 3 of their passport, as the signature must be visible.
cotenant-guarantor.permit: Please make sure to add their permit front and back.
cotenant-guarantor.independent: I add a proof of independent professional activity from their guarantor.
cotenant-guarantor.internship: I add the complete and signed internship agreement from their guarantor.
cotenant-guarantor.less-than-year: I have provided all the required documents for their guarantor.
cotenant-guarantor.my-name: I add a tax assessment issued within the last two years in the name of their guarantor. The fiscal number and the income must be legible.
cotenant-guarantor.other-tax: To improve my application, I explain below why I don't have a tax assessment in the name of their guarantor. This explanation will be added to my application:
cotenant-guarantor.owner: I add a proof of address of their guarantor issued within the last three months.
cotenant-guarantor.pension: I add a pension slip or attestation from their guarantor, or a tax assessment in their name, complete and issued within the last 2 years.
cotenant-guarantor.public: I add a salary slip from their guarantor issued within the last 3 months, an employer's attestation issued within the last 3 months, and their appointment decree.
cotenant-guarantor.rent: I add proof of rent payment from their guarantor, or a tax assessment in their name, complete and issued within the last 2 years.
cotenant-guarantor.retired: I add a retirement pension bulletin, certificate, or title from their guarantor, or their complete tax assessment from less than 2 years ago.
cotenant-guarantor.salary: I add a payslip from their guarantor dated less than 3 months ago, an employer's attestation, proof of internship allowance payment, a financial statement, or a tax assessment in their name, complete and from less than 2 years ago.
cotenant-guarantor.scholarship: I add a scholarship award notice from their guarantor.
cotenant-guarantor.social-service: I add proof of social benefits payment (such as unemployment benefits, family benefits, or student benefits from CROUS) from their guarantor dated less than 3 months ago, proof of benefit entitlement, or a simulation certificate for housing assistance.
cotenant-guarantor.student: I add a copy of their guarantor's student card or their current school certificate for the current year.
cotenant-guarantor.tenant: I add a proof of residence from their guarantor dated less than three months ago.
cotenant-guarantor.unemployed: I add proof of their guarantor's entitlement to unemployment benefits or their Pôle Emploi situation report dated less than 3 months ago.
cotenant-guarantor.noDocument-social: I cannot provide proof of social benefits payment.
cotenant-guarantor.noDocument-salary: I cannot provide the last three payslips or a financial statement from their guarantor.
cotenant-guarantor.noDocument-pension: I cannot provide proof of pension payment.
cotenant-guarantor.noDocument-rent: I cannot provide proof of rent payment.
cotenant-guarantor.noDocument-scholarship: I cannot provide proof of scholarship award.

account.last-update: Last update of the file on {0}
account.file-update-text:
You have updated your file, last updated on {0}.
To keep it convincing, it is important to keep your supporting documents up to date.

delete-bloc.title: Account deletion
delete-bloc.content: You can delete your DossierFacile account at any time. This will automatically delete all you documents.

opinion-bloc.title: Tell us about your experience with DossierFacile
opinion-bloc.content: We are constantly looking to improve the quality of our service. As part of this improvement process, we seek your feedback. By clicking on the button below, you will be able to rate DossierFacile. Your feedback is valuable to us! Thank you.

account.share-file-description: Copy your file link to share it! It's up to you to send it to the landlords or property owners of your choice (by email, SMS, etc.)
account.file-resume:
Share my summary file
(without supporting documents)
account.file-full:
Share my complete file
(with supporting documents)
account.income: have a monthly net income of {0}€
account.amendment-required-text:
After reviewing your file, modifications are requested.
Check your messages for details.
account.instructional-time-text: Once your file is completed and submitted, it is typically processed within 24 hours by our team of operators.
account.congratulations-text-1: To apply for the housing of your dreams, share your file with a landlord of your choice, with or without supporting documents, either by email by entering their email address in the section "Share my file" below, or by link by sending your DossierFacile link by email, SMS, etc. to the landlords of your choice. Please note that DossierFacile does not offer housing.
account.full-link-copied: The link to my complete file is copied!
account.public-link-copied: The link to my summary file is copied!

changepasswordpage.token-expired: The link has expired, please start the forgot password procedure

confirmaccount.token-err: An error occurred, if you have already confirmed your account you can log in, otherwise you can start the password reset procedure

coupleinformationhelp.paragraph1: By providing your co-tenant's email address, they will be invited to contribute to the creation of your joint application. With their own email and password, they will have the ability to log into your joint application and add, modify, or delete any document, both their personal documents and yours.
coupleinformationhelp.paragraph2: Attention! Your personal documents and their personal documents will be processed separately by DossierFacile. You can submit and have them validated independently. However, your joint application will only be validated as a whole once both your documents and their documents have been validated by DossierFacile. You will then have a single shared link for your entire joint application.
coupleinformationhelp.paragraph3: In practice, your co-tenant will receive an invitation by email, which they must validate within 48 hours. They simply need to click the link, set their password, and they will be connected to your joint application.

coupleinformation.acceptAuthor: I agree that my partner will have access to my documents and those of my guarantor, if applicable, once both of our applications have been validated
coupleinformation.partner-email-title: Invite them to fill out their application?
coupleinformation.email-exists:
You cannot associate two accounts with the same email address!
Please provide a different email address.

deleteaccount.title: Account Deletion
deleteaccount.confirm-delete: Please confirm the complete deletion of the account
deleteaccount.try-again: An error occurred, please try again later.

documentdownloader.will-delete-files: Warning, a change in your situation will delete the supporting documents. You will need to upload the documents again.
documentdownloader.warning-no-document-and-files: You cannot have files selected and indicate that you cannot provide all the files. Please uncheck the box or remove your files.
documentdownloader.noDocument-default: I cannot provide the requested documents

documenthelp.title: Help
documenthelp.paragraph1:
If your document is too large, we recommend scanning it (using a free app for smartphones, for example).
If that doesn't work, contact us by email at contact@dossierfacile.logement.gouv.fr, and we'll do our best to respond as quickly as possible!

guarantorchoicehelp.paragraph1:
A guarantor is a natural or legal person who undertakes to pay the tenant's rental debts to the landlord.
More information at https://www.service-public.fr/particuliers/vosdroits/F31267
guarantorchoicehelp.paragraph2: Some organizations can also provide a guarantee. Obtain a free Visale guarantee at www.visale.fr!
guarantorchoicehelp.paragraph3: Attention: you are not required to add a guarantor. However, some landlords may require one.

guarantorchoice.corporation-identification: Identity of the Legal Entity Representative
guarantorchoice.will-delete-guarantor: Do you really want to change the type of guarantor?

no-guarantor.cotenant: My partner doesn't have a guarantor

guarantorchoice.optional-guarantor: Adding a guarantor is not mandatory. If you don't have a guarantor, you can select no guarantor at the bottom of the page to proceed to the next step.
guarantorchoice.two-guarantors-warning: If you have 2 guarantors, add them one after the other. The documents of your 2 guarantors should not be mixed.
guarantorchoice.visale-text: Visale is the guarantor for your future accommodation if you are between 18 and 30 years old OR if you are over 30 years old and employed (subject to conditions).

nameinformationform.zipcode: Postal Code (only if you reside in France)
nameinformationform.title: Let's start with your personal identity information.
nameinformationform.subtitle: Please provide the information of the person whose name will appear on the lease agreement.
nameinformationform.unlink-fc-content: In order to make changes to your name and first name, you need to unlink your FranceConnect and DossierFacile accounts.
nameinformationform.unlink-fc-content-password-exists: You can then use the password you previously set.
nameinformationform.unlink-fc-content-password-undefined: You will then be redirected to the password update page.

nameinformationhelp.info: If you are filling out the form on behalf of someone else, such as your child, please provide their information instead of yours.
nameinformationhelp.info-fc: The form must be in the name of the prospective tenant. If you are filling out the form on behalf of someone else, such as your child, you need to

nameinformation.title: Your Rental File in 5 Documents!
nameinformation.join-title: You're just a few steps away from joining {0}'s rental file!
nameinformation.same-for-guarantors: And the same list for your guarantors!

ownershare.title: Apply for the housing located at {0}
ownershare.subtitle: DossierFacile is a government startup that allows you to create your smart rental file and share it with property owners
ownershare.accept-owner: I accept that {0}, the owner located at {1}, has access to the information in my file and that of my spouse or roommates, if applicable. In accordance with the GDPR, I can revoke this authorization at any time.
ownershare.no-account-1: If you don't have an account, you can create one and come back to this page later.
ownershare.no-account-2: Our file is easy to fill out (less than 3 minutes, promised) and it complies with the law.
ownershare.no-account-3: And reusable for all your other visits!
ownershare.connection-success: Your file has been successfully shared with the owner
ownershare.join-account: As a guest account, you cannot link your file to an owner account. Please ask the account that invited you to do so.

partnerssection.partners-services-section: Do you know the following services?
partnerssection.mds-text: Discover in a few clicks the social benefits you can apply for
partnerssection.anil-text: Practical information about your rights and obligations? Your ADIL advises you for free
partnerssection.go-to-mds: Go to "mes droits sociaux" website (new window)
partnerssection.signal-text: If you think you are dealing with a scam in a classified ad, {nodocument}, and report it on {masecurite}, the website of the Ministry of the Interior.

residency-page.will-delete-files: Attention, changing your situation will delete your supporting documents. You will need to upload the documents corresponding to your new situation again.
residency-page.warning-incomplete: Incomplete files (those that do not include these 3 documents) will not be validated.
residency-page.warning-only-rent-receipt: Proof of residence (housing tax, electricity bill, telephone bill, etc.) are not accepted here. Only your receipts (or a certificate of good payment of rents) allow a landlord to ensure that you pay your rents.

roommatesinformationhelp.paragraph1: By providing your roommate's email address, they will be able to create their own file with their documents. Your two files will be linked, and your shared file link will be common.
roommatesinformationhelp.paragraph2: Concretely, your roommate will receive an invitation that they will need to validate within 48 hours.
roommatesinformationhelp.paragraph3: In case your roommate couldn't confirm their registration within 48 hours, you will need to start over!

roommatesinformation.acceptAuthor: I accept that other members of my shared housing have access to my documents and those of my guarantor, if applicable, once all the shared files have been validated
roommatesinformation.title: Who will be your roommates?
roommatesinformation.email-exists:
You cannot associate two accounts with the same email address!
Please provide a different email address.
roommatesinformation.email-exists-2:
This email address is already used on DossierFacile.
Please provide a different email address.
roommatesinformation.more-information: Why is this information useful to us?

sharefile.title: Share my file
sharefile.desc1: To apply for the home of your dreams, share your application with the landlord of your choice, with or without supporting documents. You can do this either by email, providing their email address below, or by sending your DossierFacile link via email, SMS, etc. to the landlords or property owners of your choice.
sharefile.desc2: Please note, DossierFacile does not offer housing.
sharefile.desc3: By using the application sharing feature, you agree to have your email address shared with the landlord.
sharefile.sent-success: Your file has been successfully shared

signuppage.mail-sent: An email has been sent to the provided address.
signuppage.clic-to-confirm: Please click on the link sent to confirm your email address and proceed with your registration.
signuppage.duplicate-email: This email is already in use
signuppage.my-file-subtitle: You are about to complete your rental file

simulationcaf.simulation-caf-text: Discover the estimation of housing assistance you could be eligible for.

taxhelp.title: Help
taxhelp.paragraph1: You can now download a tax notice from www.impots.gouv.fr
taxhelp.paragraph2:
If your document is too large, we recommend scanning it (using a free smartphone application, for example).
If that doesn't work, contact us by email at contact@dossierfacile.logement.gouv.fr, and we will do our best to respond as quickly as possible!

tax-page.my-name: You have a tax notice in your name
tax-page.my-parents: You are tax dependant on your parents
tax-page.less-than-year: You have been in France for less than a year
tax-page.accept-verification: I agree that DossierFacile performs an automated verification of my tax notice with the tax authorities
tax-page.custom-text: To improve your file, please explain below why you don't receive a tax notice. Your explanation will be added to your file:

tax-page.warning-no-accepted-doc: Warning, the declarative situation notice is not accepted.
tax-page.avis-text1: We have detected a declarative situation notice as a proof of tax. Unfortunately, this document is purely declarative and is not acceptable.
tax-page.avis-text2: We invite you to submit a tax notice concerning your income from the previous year.
tax-page.avis-force: Do you think this is an error? Ignore and proceed

tenantguarantorchoice.two-guarantors-warning: If your partner has 2 guarantors, add them one after the other. The documents of the 2 guarantors must not be mixed.

tenantinformationform.remove-couple: Attention, this will dissociate your application from your spouse

tenantinformationform.acceptAuthorCoTenant: I accept that the other members of my co-tenancy have access to my documents as well as those of my guarantor, if applicable, once all co-tenancy applications are validated

tenantinformationform.roommate-email-required: You must enter the email address of at least one roommate.
tenantinformationform.couple-email-required: You must enter the email address of your spouse.
tenantinformationform.will-delete-couple: This action will delete your spouse's application
tenantinformationform.will-delete-roommates: This action will remove the association with your roommates' applications

tenantpanel.title: Hello {0}, Your {1} Application!
tenantpanel.last-update: Last update to the application on {0}
tenantpanel.file-update-text:
You have updated your application, last updated on {0}.
To keep it compelling, it's important to keep your supporting documents up to date.
tenantpanel.opinion: Tell us about your DossierFacile.fr experience
tenantpanel.share-file-description: Copy your application link to share it! You can send it to landlords or property owners of your choice (via email, SMS, etc.)
tenantpanel.file-resume:
Share My Summary Application
(without supporting documents)
tenantpanel.file-full:
Share My Complete Application
(with supporting documents)
tenantpanel.income: to have a monthly net income of {0}€
tenantpanel.spouse-cannot-copy-link: Your link is inactive because your spouse's application is not yet validated
tenantpanel.cotenant-cannot-copy-link: Your link is inactive because the applications of your roommate(s) are not yet validated
tenantpanel.amendment-required-text:
After reviewing your application, modifications are required.
Check your messages for details.
tenantpanel.instructional-time-text: Once your application is completed and submitted, it will be processed within 24 to 48 hours by our team of operators.
tenantpanel.congratulations-text-1: To apply for your dream accommodation, share your application with a landlord of your choice, with or without supporting documents. You can do this by email, by providing their email address in the "Share My Application" section below, or by sending your DossierFacile link via email, SMS, etc. to the landlords or property owners of your choice.
tenantpanel.congratulations-text-2: Please note that DossierFacile does not provide accommodation.
tenantpanel.full-link-copied: My Complete Application Link is Copied!
tenantpanel.public-link-copied: My Summary Application Link is Copied!

uploaddocuments.warning-need-residency-documents:
Are you sure you have submitted all the necessary documents here?
  • Proof of residence
  • Copy of your host's identity document
  • Proof of address (less than 3 months old) of your host
uploaddocuments.warning-need-residency-documents-tenant:
Are you sure you have properly submitted your last 3 rent receipts (or a proof of good payment of rent)? A rent receipt indicates to a landlord that you are paying your rent on time. A document that only mentions your address (such as an EDF bill) is not sufficient in this case.

This is a very common mistake, and your application cannot be approved without these 3 rent receipts.

validatefile.title: I Validate My File
validatefile.read-no-guarantor: I read and check the following box to validate my file
validatefile.declaration: I declare that I am aware of Article 441-1 of the Penal Code, which penalizes forgery and the use of forgery with three years of imprisonment and a fine of 45,000 euros.
validatefile.precision: If I wish, I can provide specific important information about my situation to my future landlords. My text will be added at the beginning of my file:
validatefile.read: I read and check the following boxes to validate my file
validatefile.declaration2: I declare that I have obtained the consent of the individuals (spouse, roommates, or guarantors) to use their personal documents and associate them with my file.
validatefile.declaration2-plural: I solemnly declare that I have obtained the consent of my guarantors for their data to be processed within the rental process.
validatefile.validation-error-description: Limit modifications and make sure to validate your file today.

file-not-ready.title: Your file {0}
file-not-ready.explanation: As soon as it is validated, you will be able to share it and to manage the shared files below.

404.title: Page not found
404.subtitle: Error 404
404.caption: This is not the web page you are lookingfor.

content.line1: If you typed the web address in the browser, make sure it is correct. The page may no longer be available.
content.line2: In this case, to continue your visit, you can check out our homepage.
content.line3: Otherwise, contact us so that we can redirect you to the right information.
